mapper.select: select m.id, m.password, m.name, m.address, m.email, m.birthday, m.mileage, m.total_use_mileage as totalUseMileage, gro.mgroup_no, gro.mgroup_name, gra.mgrade_no, gra.mgrade_name from gt_member m inner join member_group gro on m.mgroup_no=gro.mgroup_no inner join member_grade gra on m.mgrade_no=gra.mgrade_no and m.id=#{value}
mapper.update: update GT_MEMBER set password=#{password} where id=#{id}
update GT_MEMBER set address=#{address}, email=#{email} where id=#{id}
update GT_MEMBER set mgroup_no = '5' where id = #{value}
update GT_MEMBER set mileage=mileage + #{mtVolume} where id =#{memberVO.id}
update GT_MEMBER set mileage=mileage - #{mtVolume} where id =#{memberVO.id}
update gt_member set mileage=mileage-#{tdMileage}, total_use_mileage=total_use_mileage+#{tdMileage} where id=#{memberVO.id}
mapper.insert:
select web_question_seq.nextval from dual
insert into web_question(wq_no, thread, wq_title, wq_contents, id) values (#{wqNo}, #{wqNo}*100, #{wqTitle}, #{wqContents}, #{memberVO.id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from web_question where id=#{value}
select m.id,m.password,m.name,m.address,to_char(m.birthday,'yyyy.mm.dd') birthday, m.mileage,m.total_use_mileage from gt_member m, web_question wq where m.id=wq.id and wq.wq_no=#{value}
mapper.update: update web_question set wq_title=#{wqTitle}, wq_contents=#{wqContents} where wq_no=#{wqNo}
mapper.select: SELECT r.rp_no, r.rp_title, r.rp_contents, r.rp_regdate, r.rp_rate, p.dp_title FROM review_post r INNER JOIN gt_member m ON r.id = m.id INNER JOIN donation_post p ON p.dp_no = r.dp_no INNER JOIN take_donation t ON t.td_no = r.td_no AND r.rp_no=#{value}

select t.td_no, t.td_regdate, t.td_mileage, d.dp_title from( select row_number() over (order by td_no desc) as rnum,td_no,to_char(td_regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') as td_regdate,td_mileage,id,dp_no from take_donation where id=#{id}) t, donation_post d where t.dp_no = d.dp_no and rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by t.td_no desc

select a.app_no, a.app_title, a.app_regdate, a.app_status from( select row_number() over (order by app_no desc) as rnum,app_no,to_char(app_regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') as app_regdate,app_status,id,app_title from application where id=#{id}) a, gt_member m where a.id = m.id and rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by a.app_no desc
